venue.name: John Joseph Moakley : United States Courthouse

item.description:
Did you attend SBN's Hyper-Local Brewfest in June? The Local Lovefest continues on Boston Harbor in October.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Join us for Sustainable Business Network of Massachusetts' 3rd Annual Local Craft Brewfest on the HarborPark, where the City meets the sea at the location of the John Joseph Moakley U.S. Courthouse located on the Boston waterfront in Fort Point, Boston. Come learn, explore, socialize, and network with craft brewers, artisan brews, and local food producers. While celebrating local brews, you can savor live music by local musicians at this lovefest and enjoy one of Boston's most best harbor views.

The Brewfest is a prelude to the 3rd Annual Boston Local Food Festival, which will take place 2 days later on Sunday at the Rose Kennedy Greenway, The Local Craft Brewfest will showcase local craft brewers and highlight, celebrate, and promote - brews, wines, distilleries, and artisan craft beverages made locally.

The Local Craft Brewfest is a prelude to the 3rd Annual Boston Local Food Festival, which will take place 2 days later on Sunday at the Rose Kennedy Greenway, The Brewfest will showcase local craft brewers and highlight, celebrate, and promote - brews, wines, distilleries, and artisan craft beverages made locally and offer local bites from area restaurants.

The Local Craft Brewfest is a fundraiser for SBN, (a 501c3 nonprofit organization) that supports the Boston Local Food Festival and other SBN programs. More than 50 brews and local food vendors will be featured. Brewers include Bantam Cider, Clown Shoes, Harpoon, Notch Brewing, Peak Organic, Smuttynose Brewing Company, Moonlight Meadery and many more. This event will be a great opportunity to meet brewers, vintners, and local eateries that are passionate about local food.

This is a 21+ event and all attendees must have a valid ID to enter the courthouse premises (no exceptions).
item.name: 3rd Annual Local Craft Brewfest on Boston Harbor in Fort Point (ticketed event)
